title: Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram: PMQN20
materials: Pear Shaped Diamonds (Total 4.57 Dwt (+7) & 1.32 Dwt (-7) across 109 diamonds) Marquise Cut Diamonds (Total 6.51 Dwt (-7) & 3.03 Dwt (+7) and 1.38 Dwt (1/10) across 214 diamonds) GH Color grade diamonds.
features: This exquisite two-layered haaram features a cascading floral design, meticulously crafted with brilliant, pear and marquise cut diamonds. Each diamond is carefully set to maximize its brilliance and fire, creating a breathtaking sparkle. The floral motif is modern, offering a contemporary twist on a classic design. The setting is prong set, allowing light to flood each diamond.
occasions: and any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern cocktail events and formal gatherings.
description: This diamond haaram offers unparalleled brilliance and a sophisticated design that effortlessly blends modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. Its floral design adds a touch of femininity and grace, making it a captivating piece for any discerning jewelry connoisseur. It is a true investment piece.
